00052 static const int MAX_PATH_LEN = 256;
00053 static const float polyPickExt[3] = {2, 4, 2};
00054 
00055 static void calcMeshBounds(const float* vert, int nverts, float* bmin, float* bmax)
00056 {
00057     bmin[0] = bmax[0] = vert[0];
00058     bmin[1] = bmax[1] = vert[1];
00059     bmin[2] = bmax[2] = vert[2];
00060     for (int i=1; i<nverts; i++)
00061     {
00062         if (bmin[0]>vert[3*i+0]) bmin[0] = vert[3*i+0];
00063         if (bmin[1]>vert[3*i+1]) bmin[1] = vert[3*i+1];
00064         if (bmin[2]>vert[3*i+2]) bmin[2] = vert[3*i+2];
00065 
00066         if (bmax[0]<vert[3*i+0]) bmax[0] = vert[3*i+0];
00067         if (bmax[1]<vert[3*i+1]) bmax[1] = vert[3*i+1];
00068         if (bmax[2]<vert[3*i+2]) bmax[2] = vert[3*i+2];
00069     }
00070 }
00071 
00072 inline void flipAxes(float* vec)
00073 {
00074     std::swap(vec[1],vec[2]);
00075 }

00089 CValue* KX_NavMeshObject::GetReplica()
00090 {
00091     KX_NavMeshObject* replica = new KX_NavMeshObject(*this);
00092     replica->ProcessReplica();
00093     return replica;
00094 }
00095 
00096 void KX_NavMeshObject::ProcessReplica()
00097 {
00098     KX_GameObject::ProcessReplica();
00099 
00100     BuildNavMesh();
00101     KX_Scene* scene = KX_GetActiveScene();
00102     KX_ObstacleSimulation* obssimulation = scene->GetObstacleSimulation();
00103     if (obssimulation)
00104         obssimulation->AddObstaclesForNavMesh(this);
00105 
00106 }
00107 
00108 bool KX_NavMeshObject::BuildVertIndArrays(float *&vertices, int& nverts,
00109                                        unsigned short* &polys, int& npolys, unsigned short *&dmeshes,
00110                                        float *&dvertices, int &ndvertsuniq, unsigned short *&dtris, 
00111                                        int& ndtris, int &vertsPerPoly)
00112 {
00113     DerivedMesh* dm = mesh_create_derived_no_virtual(KX_GetActiveScene()->GetBlenderScene(), GetBlenderObject(), 
00114                                                     NULL, CD_MASK_MESH);
00115     CustomData *pdata = dm->getPolyDataLayout(dm);
00116     int* recastData = (int*) CustomData_get_layer(pdata, CD_RECAST);
00117     if (recastData)
00118     {
00119         int *dtrisToPolysMap=NULL, *dtrisToTrisMap=NULL, *trisToFacesMap=NULL;
00120         int nAllVerts = 0;
00121         float *allVerts = NULL;
00122         buildNavMeshDataByDerivedMesh(dm, &vertsPerPoly, &nAllVerts, &allVerts, &ndtris, &dtris,
00123             &npolys, &dmeshes, &polys, &dtrisToPolysMap, &dtrisToTrisMap, &trisToFacesMap);
00124 
00125         MEM_freeN(dtrisToPolysMap);
00126         MEM_freeN(dtrisToTrisMap);
00127         MEM_freeN(trisToFacesMap);
00128 
00129         unsigned short *verticesMap = new unsigned short[nAllVerts];
00130         memset(verticesMap, 0xffff, sizeof(unsigned short)*nAllVerts);
00131         int curIdx = 0;
00132         //vertices - mesh verts
00133         //iterate over all polys and create map for their vertices first...
00134         for (int polyidx=0; polyidx<npolys; polyidx++)
00135         {
00136             unsigned short* poly = &polys[polyidx*vertsPerPoly*2];
00137             for (int i=0; i<vertsPerPoly; i++)
00138             {
00139                 unsigned short idx = poly[i];
00140                 if (idx==0xffff)
00141                     break;
00142                 if (verticesMap[idx]==0xffff)
00143                 {
00144                     verticesMap[idx] = curIdx++;
00145                 }
00146                 poly[i] = verticesMap[idx];
00147             }
00148         }
00149         nverts = curIdx;
00150         //...then iterate over detailed meshes
00151         //transform indices to local ones (for each navigation polygon)
00152         for (int polyidx=0; polyidx<npolys; polyidx++)
00153         {
00154             unsigned short *poly = &polys[polyidx*vertsPerPoly*2];
00155             int nv = polyNumVerts(poly, vertsPerPoly);
00156             unsigned short *dmesh = &dmeshes[4*polyidx];
00157             unsigned short tribase = dmesh[2];
00158             unsigned short trinum = dmesh[3];
00159             unsigned short vbase = curIdx;
00160             for (int j=0; j<trinum; j++)
00161             {
00162                 unsigned short* dtri = &dtris[(tribase+j)*3*2];
00163                 for (int k=0; k<3; k++)
00164                 {
00165                     int newVertexIdx = verticesMap[dtri[k]];
00166                     if (newVertexIdx==0xffff)
00167                     {
00168                         newVertexIdx = curIdx++;
00169                         verticesMap[dtri[k]] = newVertexIdx;
00170                     }
00171 
00172                     if (newVertexIdx<nverts)
00173                     {
00174                         //it's polygon vertex ("shared")
00175                         int idxInPoly = polyFindVertex(poly, vertsPerPoly, newVertexIdx);
00176                         if (idxInPoly==-1)
00177                         {
00178                             printf("Building NavMeshObject: Error! Can't find vertex in polygon\n");
00179                             return false;
00180                         }
00181                         dtri[k] = idxInPoly;
00182                     }
00183                     else
00184                     {
00185                         dtri[k] = newVertexIdx - vbase + nv;
00186                     }
00187                 }
00188             }
00189             dmesh[0] = vbase-nverts; //verts base
00190             dmesh[1] = curIdx-vbase; //verts num
00191         }
00192 
00193         vertices = new float[nverts*3];
00194         ndvertsuniq = curIdx - nverts;
00195         if (ndvertsuniq>0)
00196         {
00197             dvertices = new float[ndvertsuniq*3];
00198         }
00199         for (int vi=0; vi<nAllVerts; vi++)
00200         {
00201             int newIdx = verticesMap[vi];
00202             if (newIdx!=0xffff)
00203             {
00204                 if (newIdx<nverts)
00205                 {
00206                     //navigation mesh vertex
00207                     memcpy(vertices+3*newIdx, allVerts+3*vi, 3*sizeof(float));
00208                 }
00209                 else
00210                 {
00211                     //detailed mesh vertex
00212                     memcpy(dvertices+3*(newIdx-nverts), allVerts+3*vi, 3*sizeof(float));
00213                 }               
00214             }
00215         }
00216 
00217         MEM_freeN(allVerts);
00218     }
00219     else
00220     {
00221         //create from RAS_MeshObject (detailed mesh is fake)
00222         RAS_MeshObject* meshobj = GetMesh(0);
00223         vertsPerPoly = 3;
00224         nverts = meshobj->m_sharedvertex_map.size();
00225         if (nverts >= 0xffff)
00226             return false;
00227         //calculate count of tris
00228         int nmeshpolys = meshobj->NumPolygons();
00229         npolys = nmeshpolys;
00230         for (int p=0; p<nmeshpolys; p++)
00231         {
00232             int vertcount = meshobj->GetPolygon(p)->VertexCount();
00233             npolys+=vertcount-3;
00234         }
00235 
00236         //create verts
00237         vertices = new float[nverts*3];
00238         float* vert = vertices;
00239         for (int vi=0; vi<nverts; vi++)
00240         {
00241             const float* pos = !meshobj->m_sharedvertex_map[vi].empty() ? meshobj->GetVertexLocation(vi) : NULL;
00242             if (pos)
00243                 copy_v3_v3(vert, pos);
00244             else
00245             {
00246                 memset(vert, 0, 3*sizeof(float)); //vertex isn't in any poly, set dummy zero coordinates
00247             }
00248             vert+=3;        
00249         }
00250 
00251         //create tris
00252         polys = (unsigned short*)MEM_callocN(sizeof(unsigned short)*3*2*npolys, "BuildVertIndArrays polys");
00253         memset(polys, 0xff, sizeof(unsigned short)*3*2*npolys);
00254         unsigned short *poly = polys;
00255         RAS_Polygon* raspoly;
00256         for (int p=0; p<nmeshpolys; p++)
00257         {
00258             raspoly = meshobj->GetPolygon(p);
00259             for (int v=0; v<raspoly->VertexCount()-2; v++)
00260             {
00261                 poly[0]= raspoly->GetVertex(0)->getOrigIndex();
00262                 for (size_t i=1; i<3; i++)
00263                 {
00264                     poly[i]= raspoly->GetVertex(v+i)->getOrigIndex();
00265                 }
00266                 poly += 6;
00267             }
00268         }
00269         dmeshes = NULL;
00270         dvertices = NULL;
00271         ndvertsuniq = 0;
00272         dtris = NULL;
00273         ndtris = npolys;
00274     }
00275     dm->release(dm);
00276     
00277     return true;
00278 }
00279 
00280 
00281 bool KX_NavMeshObject::BuildNavMesh()
00282 {
00283     if (m_navMesh)
00284     {
00285         delete m_navMesh;
00286         m_navMesh = NULL;
00287     }
00288 
00289     if (GetMeshCount()==0)
00290     {
00291         printf("Can't find mesh for navmesh object: %s\n", m_name.ReadPtr());
00292         return false;
00293     }
00294 
00295     float *vertices = NULL, *dvertices = NULL;
00296     unsigned short *polys = NULL, *dtris = NULL, *dmeshes = NULL;
00297     int nverts = 0, npolys = 0, ndvertsuniq = 0, ndtris = 0;    
00298     int vertsPerPoly = 0;
00299     if (!BuildVertIndArrays(vertices, nverts, polys, npolys, 
00300                             dmeshes, dvertices, ndvertsuniq, dtris, ndtris, vertsPerPoly ) 
00301             || vertsPerPoly<3)
00302     {
00303         printf("Can't build navigation mesh data for object:%s\n", m_name.ReadPtr());
00304         return false;
00305     }
00306     
00307     MT_Point3 pos;
00308     if (dmeshes==NULL)
00309     {
00310         for (int i=0; i<nverts; i++)
00311         {
00312             flipAxes(&vertices[i*3]);
00313         }
00314         for (int i=0; i<ndvertsuniq; i++)
00315         {
00316             flipAxes(&dvertices[i*3]);
00317         }
00318     }
00319 
00320     buildMeshAdjacency(polys, npolys, nverts, vertsPerPoly);
00321     
00322     float cs = 0.2f;
00323 
00324     if (!nverts || !npolys)
00325         return false;
00326 
00327     float bmin[3], bmax[3];
00328     calcMeshBounds(vertices, nverts, bmin, bmax);
00329     //quantize vertex pos
00330     unsigned short* vertsi = new unsigned short[3*nverts];
00331     float ics = 1.f/cs;
00332     for (int i=0; i<nverts; i++)
00333     {
00334         vertsi[3*i+0] = static_cast<unsigned short>((vertices[3*i+0]-bmin[0])*ics);
00335         vertsi[3*i+1] = static_cast<unsigned short>((vertices[3*i+1]-bmin[1])*ics);
00336         vertsi[3*i+2] = static_cast<unsigned short>((vertices[3*i+2]-bmin[2])*ics);
00337     }
00338 
00339     // Calculate data size
00340     const int headerSize = sizeof(dtStatNavMeshHeader);
00341     const int vertsSize = sizeof(float)*3*nverts;
00342     const int polysSize = sizeof(dtStatPoly)*npolys;
00343     const int nodesSize = sizeof(dtStatBVNode)*npolys*2;
00344     const int detailMeshesSize = sizeof(dtStatPolyDetail)*npolys;
00345     const int detailVertsSize = sizeof(float)*3*ndvertsuniq;
00346     const int detailTrisSize = sizeof(unsigned char)*4*ndtris;
00347 
00348     const int dataSize = headerSize + vertsSize + polysSize + nodesSize +
00349         detailMeshesSize + detailVertsSize + detailTrisSize;
00350     unsigned char* data = new unsigned char[dataSize];
00351     if (!data)
00352         return false;
00353     memset(data, 0, dataSize);
00354 
00355     unsigned char* d = data;
00356     dtStatNavMeshHeader* header = (dtStatNavMeshHeader*)d; d += headerSize;
00357     float* navVerts = (float*)d; d += vertsSize;
00358     dtStatPoly* navPolys = (dtStatPoly*)d; d += polysSize;
00359     dtStatBVNode* navNodes = (dtStatBVNode*)d; d += nodesSize;
00360     dtStatPolyDetail* navDMeshes = (dtStatPolyDetail*)d; d += detailMeshesSize;
00361     float* navDVerts = (float*)d; d += detailVertsSize;
00362     unsigned char* navDTris = (unsigned char*)d; d += detailTrisSize;
00363 
00364     // Store header
00365     header->magic = DT_STAT_NAVMESH_MAGIC;
00366     header->version = DT_STAT_NAVMESH_VERSION;
00367     header->npolys = npolys;
00368     header->nverts = nverts;
00369     header->cs = cs;
00370     header->bmin[0] = bmin[0];
00371     header->bmin[1] = bmin[1];
00372     header->bmin[2] = bmin[2];
00373     header->bmax[0] = bmax[0];
00374     header->bmax[1] = bmax[1];
00375     header->bmax[2] = bmax[2];
00376     header->ndmeshes = npolys;
00377     header->ndverts = ndvertsuniq;
00378     header->ndtris = ndtris;
00379 
00380     // Store vertices
00381     for (int i = 0; i < nverts; ++i)
00382     {
00383         const unsigned short* iv = &vertsi[i*3];
00384         float* v = &navVerts[i*3];
00385         v[0] = bmin[0] + iv[0] * cs;
00386         v[1] = bmin[1] + iv[1] * cs;
00387         v[2] = bmin[2] + iv[2] * cs;
00388     }
00389     //memcpy(navVerts, vertices, nverts*3*sizeof(float));
00390 
00391     // Store polygons
00392     const unsigned short* src = polys;
00393     for (int i = 0; i < npolys; ++i)
00394     {
00395         dtStatPoly* p = &navPolys[i];
00396         p->nv = 0;
00397         for (int j = 0; j < vertsPerPoly; ++j)
00398         {
00399             if (src[j] == 0xffff) break;
00400             p->v[j] = src[j];
00401             p->n[j] = src[vertsPerPoly+j]+1;
00402             p->nv++;
00403         }
00404         src += vertsPerPoly*2;
00405     }
00406 
00407     header->nnodes = createBVTree(vertsi, nverts, polys, npolys, vertsPerPoly,
00408                                 cs, cs, npolys*2, navNodes);
00409     
00410     
00411     if (dmeshes==NULL)
00412     {
00413         //create fake detail meshes
00414         for (int i = 0; i < npolys; ++i)
00415         {
00416             dtStatPolyDetail& dtl = navDMeshes[i];
00417             dtl.vbase = 0;
00418             dtl.nverts = 0;
00419             dtl.tbase = i;
00420             dtl.ntris = 1;
00421         }
00422         // setup triangles.
00423         unsigned char* tri = navDTris;
00424         for (size_t i=0; i<ndtris; i++)
00425         {
00426             for (size_t j=0; j<3; j++)
00427                 tri[4*i+j] = j;
00428         }
00429     }
00430     else
00431     {
00432         //verts
00433         memcpy(navDVerts, dvertices, ndvertsuniq*3*sizeof(float));
00434         //tris
00435         unsigned char* tri = navDTris;
00436         for (size_t i=0; i<ndtris; i++)
00437         {
00438             for (size_t j=0; j<3; j++)
00439                 tri[4*i+j] = dtris[6*i+j];
00440         }
00441         //detailed meshes
00442         for (int i = 0; i < npolys; ++i)
00443         {
00444             dtStatPolyDetail& dtl = navDMeshes[i];
00445             dtl.vbase = dmeshes[i*4+0];
00446             dtl.nverts = dmeshes[i*4+1];
00447             dtl.tbase = dmeshes[i*4+2];
00448             dtl.ntris = dmeshes[i*4+3];
00449         }       
00450     }
00451 
00452     m_navMesh = new dtStatNavMesh;
00453     m_navMesh->init(data, dataSize, true);  
00454 
00455     delete [] vertices;
00456 
00457     /* navmesh conversion is using C guarded alloc for memory allocaitons */
00458     MEM_freeN(polys);
00459     if (dmeshes) MEM_freeN(dmeshes);
00460     if (dtris) MEM_freeN(dtris);
00461 
00462     if (dvertices)
00463     {
00464         delete [] dvertices;
00465     }
00466 
00467     return true;
00468 }
00469 
00470 dtStatNavMesh* KX_NavMeshObject::GetNavMesh()
00471 {
00472     return m_navMesh;
00473 }
00474 
00475 void KX_NavMeshObject::DrawNavMesh(NavMeshRenderMode renderMode)
00476 {
00477     if (!m_navMesh)
00478         return;
00479     MT_Vector3 color(0.f, 0.f, 0.f);
00480     
00481     switch (renderMode)
00482     {
00483     case RM_POLYS :
00484     case RM_WALLS : 
00485         for (int pi=0; pi<m_navMesh->getPolyCount(); pi++)
00486         {
00487             const dtStatPoly* poly = m_navMesh->getPoly(pi);
00488 
00489             for (int i = 0, j = (int)poly->nv-1; i < (int)poly->nv; j = i++)
00490             {   
00491                 if (poly->n[j] && renderMode==RM_WALLS) 
00492                     continue;
00493                 const float* vif = m_navMesh->getVertex(poly->v[i]);
00494                 const float* vjf = m_navMesh->getVertex(poly->v[j]);
00495                 MT_Point3 vi(vif[0], vif[2], vif[1]);
00496                 MT_Point3 vj(vjf[0], vjf[2], vjf[1]);
00497                 vi = TransformToWorldCoords(vi);
00498                 vj = TransformToWorldCoords(vj);
00499                 KX_RasterizerDrawDebugLine(vi, vj, color);
00500             }
00501         }
00502         break;
00503     case RM_TRIS : 
00504         for (int i = 0; i < m_navMesh->getPolyDetailCount(); ++i)
00505         {
00506             const dtStatPoly* p = m_navMesh->getPoly(i);
00507             const dtStatPolyDetail* pd = m_navMesh->getPolyDetail(i);
00508 
00509             for (int j = 0; j < pd->ntris; ++j)
00510             {
00511                 const unsigned char* t = m_navMesh->getDetailTri(pd->tbase+j);
00512                 MT_Point3 tri[3];
00513                 for (int k = 0; k < 3; ++k)
00514                 {
00515                     const float* v;
00516                     if (t[k] < p->nv)
00517                         v = m_navMesh->getVertex(p->v[t[k]]);
00518                     else
00519                         v =  m_navMesh->getDetailVertex(pd->vbase+(t[k]-p->nv));
00520                     float pos[3];
00521                     rcVcopy(pos, v);
00522                     flipAxes(pos);
00523                     tri[k].setValue(pos);
00524                 }
00525 
00526                 for (int k=0; k<3; k++)
00527                     tri[k] = TransformToWorldCoords(tri[k]);
00528 
00529                 for (int k=0; k<3; k++)
00530                     KX_RasterizerDrawDebugLine(tri[k], tri[(k+1)%3], color);
00531             }
00532         }
00533         break;
00534     default:
00535         /* pass */
00536         break;
00537     }
00538 }
00539 
00540 MT_Point3 KX_NavMeshObject::TransformToLocalCoords(const MT_Point3& wpos)
00541 {
00542     MT_Matrix3x3 orientation = NodeGetWorldOrientation();
00543     const MT_Vector3& scaling = NodeGetWorldScaling();
00544     orientation.scale(scaling[0], scaling[1], scaling[2]);
00545     MT_Transform worldtr(NodeGetWorldPosition(), orientation); 
00546     MT_Transform invworldtr;
00547     invworldtr.invert(worldtr);
00548     MT_Point3 lpos = invworldtr(wpos);
00549     return lpos;
00550 }
00551 
00552 MT_Point3 KX_NavMeshObject::TransformToWorldCoords(const MT_Point3& lpos)
00553 {
00554     MT_Matrix3x3 orientation = NodeGetWorldOrientation();
00555     const MT_Vector3& scaling = NodeGetWorldScaling();
00556     orientation.scale(scaling[0], scaling[1], scaling[2]);
00557     MT_Transform worldtr(NodeGetWorldPosition(), orientation); 
00558     MT_Point3 wpos = worldtr(lpos);
00559     return wpos;
00560 }
00561 
00562 int KX_NavMeshObject::FindPath(const MT_Point3& from, const MT_Point3& to, float* path, int maxPathLen)
00563 {
00564     if (!m_navMesh)
00565         return 0;
00566     MT_Point3 localfrom = TransformToLocalCoords(from);
00567     MT_Point3 localto = TransformToLocalCoords(to); 
00568     float spos[3], epos[3];
00569     localfrom.getValue(spos); flipAxes(spos);
00570     localto.getValue(epos); flipAxes(epos);
00571     dtStatPolyRef sPolyRef = m_navMesh->findNearestPoly(spos, polyPickExt);
00572     dtStatPolyRef ePolyRef = m_navMesh->findNearestPoly(epos, polyPickExt);
00573 
00574     int pathLen = 0;
00575     if (sPolyRef && ePolyRef)
00576     {
00577         dtStatPolyRef* polys = new dtStatPolyRef[maxPathLen];
00578         int npolys;
00579         npolys = m_navMesh->findPath(sPolyRef, ePolyRef, spos, epos, polys, maxPathLen);
00580         if (npolys)
00581         {
00582             pathLen = m_navMesh->findStraightPath(spos, epos, polys, npolys, path, maxPathLen);
00583             for (int i=0; i<pathLen; i++)
00584             {
00585                 flipAxes(&path[i*3]);
00586                 MT_Point3 waypoint(&path[i*3]);
00587                 waypoint = TransformToWorldCoords(waypoint);
00588                 waypoint.getValue(&path[i*3]);
00589             }
00590         }
00591     }
00592 
00593     return pathLen;
00594 }
00595 
00596 float KX_NavMeshObject::Raycast(const MT_Point3& from, const MT_Point3& to)
00597 {
00598     if (!m_navMesh)
00599         return 0.f;
00600     MT_Point3 localfrom = TransformToLocalCoords(from);
00601     MT_Point3 localto = TransformToLocalCoords(to); 
00602     float spos[3], epos[3];
00603     localfrom.getValue(spos); flipAxes(spos);
00604     localto.getValue(epos); flipAxes(epos);
00605     dtStatPolyRef sPolyRef = m_navMesh->findNearestPoly(spos, polyPickExt);
00606     float t=0;
00607     static dtStatPolyRef polys[MAX_PATH_LEN];
00608     m_navMesh->raycast(sPolyRef, spos, epos, t, polys, MAX_PATH_LEN);
00609     return t;
00610 }
00611 
00612 void KX_NavMeshObject::DrawPath(const float *path, int pathLen, const MT_Vector3& color)
00613 {
00614     MT_Vector3 a,b;
00615     for (int i=0; i<pathLen-1; i++)
00616     {
00617         a.setValue(&path[3*i]);
00618         b.setValue(&path[3*(i+1)]);
00619         KX_RasterizerDrawDebugLine(a, b, color);
00620     }
00621 }

00665 
00666 KX_PYMETHODDEF_DOC(KX_NavMeshObject, findPath,
00667                    "findPath(start, goal): find path from start to goal points\n"
00668                    "Returns a path as list of points)\n")
00669 {
00670     PyObject *ob_from, *ob_to;
00671     if (!PyArg_ParseTuple(args,"OO:getPath",&ob_from,&ob_to))
00672         return NULL;
00673     MT_Point3 from, to;
00674     if (!PyVecTo(ob_from, from) || !PyVecTo(ob_to, to))
00675         return NULL;
00676     
00677     float path[MAX_PATH_LEN*3];
00678     int pathLen = FindPath(from, to, path, MAX_PATH_LEN);
00679     PyObject *pathList = PyList_New( pathLen );
00680     for (int i=0; i<pathLen; i++)
00681     {
00682         MT_Point3 point(&path[3*i]);
00683         PyList_SET_ITEM(pathList, i, PyObjectFrom(point));
00684     }
00685 
00686     return pathList;
00687 }
00688 
00689 KX_PYMETHODDEF_DOC(KX_NavMeshObject, raycast,
00690                    "raycast(start, goal): raycast from start to goal points\n"
00691                    "Returns hit factor)\n")
00692 {
00693     PyObject *ob_from, *ob_to;
00694     if (!PyArg_ParseTuple(args,"OO:getPath",&ob_from,&ob_to))
00695         return NULL;
00696     MT_Point3 from, to;
00697     if (!PyVecTo(ob_from, from) || !PyVecTo(ob_to, to))
00698         return NULL;
00699     float hit = Raycast(from, to);
00700     return PyFloat_FromDouble(hit);
00701 }
00702 
00703 KX_PYMETHODDEF_DOC(KX_NavMeshObject, draw,
00704                    "draw(mode): navigation mesh debug drawing\n"
00705                    "mode: WALLS, POLYS, TRIS\n")
00706 {
00707     int arg;
00708     NavMeshRenderMode renderMode = RM_TRIS;
00709     if (PyArg_ParseTuple(args,"i:rebuild",&arg) && arg>=0 && arg<RM_MAX)
00710         renderMode = (NavMeshRenderMode)arg;
00711     DrawNavMesh(renderMode);
00712     Py_RETURN_NONE;
00713 }
00714 
00715 KX_PYMETHODDEF_DOC_NOARGS(KX_NavMeshObject, rebuild,
00716                           "rebuild(): rebuild navigation mesh\n")
00717 {
00718     BuildNavMesh();
00719     Py_RETURN_NONE;
00720 }
